name: Knock Space
description:
A 2d platformer shooting game where you need to discover the truth about why you were born. Your trusty shotgun will help you on the way.

Gameplay

you can shoot the enemies with the controls down below, the enemies have what looks like an eye in the middle of their body. If the enemies touch you, you lose a heart you have 3 hearts to start with.

The controls (the game only supports keyboard and mouse): 

  • space to jump 
  • left-click or x to shoot 
  • r or right-click to reload
  • escape quitting the game

Credits:

Pepeulous for making the cursor

NOTE:

nothing of your progress is saved so keep that in mind.

right now there isn't actually a story and I might not work on the game after the game jam (Godot wild jam). But if enough people want me to continue, I will.
